name: Rocket Game (cadethecrow)
description:
Things will be cut off if you dont do it in fullscreen.

You fly a rocket ship and can go on three different types of missions: easy, medium, and hard. Each one will give you a different amount of money for successfully completing it. Spend money on upgrades in the shop. Use left and right arrows to move, space or left mouse click to shoot, 1 to use your shield, and 2 to use your speed boost. Have fun!
